name: The Monster's Norm
description:
Play as a monster that comes out at night to attack a fortified castle. Block cannonballs with your fists and throw exploding humans to claim your conquest utilizing the HTC Vive's motion controls.

Instructions: Open and close your hands with trigger buttons. Block cannon balls with closed hands. Grab cannonballs and put them in your stomach's mouth. After eating three cannonballs, grab a giant cannonball from your gullet, and throw it at the towers that are shooting you. Destroy both towers to win!
